name: 楊勝明
objective: 無刷直流及永磁同步電動機具有高效率、高功率-質量比，在家電、工業設備、及電動車輛產業都已被廣泛的應用，為目前最主要的動力馬達。本課程從基本的磁路分析及永久磁鐵開始，接著介紹無刷直流的運轉原理及控制方法，然後探討永磁同步電動機之控制理論，及驅動電路技術，最後說明控制系統實現及無轉軸位置感測器控制的方法。
schedule:
1. PM and magnetic circuit
2. BLDC basics
3. stator and rotor design
4. drive and control
5. BLDC sensorless control
6. PMSM basics
7. complex vector transformation
8. PMSM mathematical model
9. mid-term exam.
10. vector control
11. maximum torque control
12. current control
13. PWM drive
14. SVPWM
15. initial position sensing
16. PMSM shaft sensorless vector control
17. PMSM shaft sensorless vector control
18. final exam.
materials:
1. Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, by Ramu Krishnan, CRC Press 2010.
2. Brushless Permanent Motor Design, 2nd Edition, by Duane Hanselman.
